message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11500. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm really interested in the product, but $11500 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending right now. I'd be willing to pay $10500.  What do you think?
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob! I understand your concerns, but I'm still a bit above your target. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $11000. What do you think?
